TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed WebPartHelpMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定用于显示 控件的帮助内容的用户界面 (UI) 的可用类型。

span.span: Specifies the available types of user interfaces (UIs) for displaying Help content for a control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 属性用于确定浏览器显示控件的帮助内容的方式。The property is used to determine how a browser will display Help content for a control. 枚举包含可应用于属性的值。 The enumeration contains values that can be applied to the property. 属性的默认值为模式。The default value for the property is Modal. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性在同一浏览器窗口中显示控件的帮助。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property to display Help for a control in the same browser window. 此示例的第一部分假定使用自定义控件, `TextDisplayWebPart`该控件位于类概述的 "示例" 部分。The first part of this example assumes the use of a custom control, `TextDisplayWebPart`, which is found in the Example section of the class overview. 此代码示例还包含一个 HTML 页面, 其中包含`TextDisplayWebPart`控件的虚拟帮助内容。The code example also includes an HTML page that contains fictitious Help content for the `TextDisplayWebPart` control. 要使此示例正常运行, 必须将以下代码保存到名为 Textwebparthelp 的文件中, 并将其放置在站点的同一目录中。For this example to work, you must save the following code in a file named Textwebparthelp.htm and place it in the same directory of your site as the .aspx page. ``` Text Content WebPart Help

Text Content WebPart Help

To make the WebPart control work...
``` 示例的最后一部分是显示如何引用`TextDisplayWebPart`控件的网页。The final part of the example is a Web page that shows how to reference the `TextDisplayWebPart` control. 请注意, 在声明性标记中 , 属性值设置为 "导航", 代码还将属性的值设置为包含帮助内容的 HTML 文件的名称。Note that in the declarative markup, the property value is set to Navigate, and the code also sets the value of the property to the name of the HTML file that contains the Help content. 将页面加载到浏览器, 并单击控件的谓词菜单上的 "帮助" 谓词。Load the page into a browser, and click the help verb on the verbs menu of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPart_HelpMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_HelpMode/CS/helpmodecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPart_HelpMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_HelpMode/VB/helpmodevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartHelpMode Modal = int32(0)

summary.span: 打开一个单独的浏览器窗口（如果浏览器具有此功能）。

span.span: Opens a separate browser window, if the browser has this capability.

summary.span: 用户在返回到 Web 部件页之前必须关闭该窗口。

span.span: A user must close the window before returning to the Web Parts page.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartHelpMode Modeless = int32(1)

summary.span: 打开一个单独的浏览器窗口（如果浏览器具有此功能）。

span.span: Opens a separate browser window, if the browser has this capability.

summary.span: 用户在返回到网页之前无需关闭该窗口。

span.span: A user does not have to close the window before returning to the Web page.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartHelpMode Navigate = int32(2)

summary.span: 替换浏览器窗口中的“Web 部件”页。

span.span: Replaces the Web Parts page in the browser window.
